00005 #ifndef LUABIND_MAKE_FUNCTION_081014_HPP
00006 # define LUABIND_MAKE_FUNCTION_081014_HPP
00007 
00008 # include <luabind/config.hpp>
00009 # include <luabind/object.hpp>
00010 # include <luabind/detail/call.hpp>
00011 # include <luabind/detail/compute_score.hpp>
00012 # include <luabind/detail/deduce_signature.hpp>
00013 # include <luabind/detail/format_signature.hpp>
00014 
00015 namespace luabind {
00016 
00017 namespace detail
00018 {
00019 # ifndef LUABIND_NO_EXCEPTIONS
00020   LUABIND_API void handle_exception_aux(lua_State* L);
00021 # endif
00022 
00023 // MSVC complains about member being sensitive to alignment (C4121)
00024 // when F is a pointer to member of a class with virtual bases.
00025 # ifdef BOOST_MSVC
00026 #  pragma pack(push)
00027 #  pragma pack(16)
00028 # endif
00029 
00030   template <class F, class Signature, class Policies>
00031   struct function_object_impl : function_object
00032   {
00033       function_object_impl(F f, Policies const& policies)
00034         : function_object(&entry_point)
00035         , f(f)
00036         , policies(policies)
00037       {}
00038 
00039       int call(lua_State* L, invoke_context& ctx) const
00040       {
00041           return invoke(L, *this, ctx, f, Signature(), policies);
00042       }
00043 
00044       void format_signature(lua_State* L, char const* function) const
00045       {
00046           detail::format_signature(L, function, Signature());
00047       }
00048 
00049       static int entry_point(lua_State* L)
00050       {
00051           function_object_impl const* impl =
00052               *(function_object_impl const**)lua_touserdata(L, lua_upvalueindex(1));
00053 
00054           invoke_context ctx;
00055 
00056           int results = 0;
00057 
00058 # ifndef LUABIND_NO_EXCEPTIONS
00059           bool exception_caught = false;
00060 
00061           try
00062           {
00063               results = invoke(
00064                   L, *impl, ctx, impl->f, Signature(), impl->policies);
00065           }
00066           catch (...)
00067           {
00068               exception_caught = true;
00069               handle_exception_aux(L);
00070           }
00071 
00072           if (exception_caught)
00073               lua_error(L);
00074 # else
00075           results = invoke(L, *impl, ctx, impl->f, Signature(), impl->policies);
00076 # endif
00077 
00078           if (!ctx)
00079           {
00080               ctx.format_error(L, impl);
00081               lua_error(L);
00082           }
00083 
00084           return results;
00085       }
00086 
00087       F f;
00088       Policies policies;
00089   };
00090 
00091 # ifdef BOOST_MSVC
00092 #  pragma pack(pop)
00093 # endif
00094 
00095   LUABIND_API object make_function_aux(
00096       lua_State* L, function_object* impl
00097   );
00098 
00099   LUABIND_API void add_overload(object const&, char const*, object const&);
00100 
00101 } // namespace detail
00102 
00103 template <class F, class Signature, class Policies>
00104 object make_function(lua_State* L, F f, Signature, Policies)
00105 {
00106     return detail::make_function_aux(
00107         L
00108       , new detail::function_object_impl<F, Signature, Policies>(
00109             f, Policies()
00110         )
00111     );
00112 }
00113 
00114 template <class F>
00115 object make_function(lua_State* L, F f)
00116 {
00117     return make_function(L, detail::deduce_signature(f), detail::null_type());
00118 }
00119 
00120 } // namespace luabind
00121 
00122 #endif // LUABIND_MAKE_FUNCTION_081014_HPP
